channel.title: hugo on Frankie Liu's Site
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on Frankie Liu's Site

item.title: Theme
item.description: baseof All the pages take off from this one single In particular, single can override some of the blocks of baseof adoc In order to get asciidoctor’s style to be retained, we disabled most of the styling.

item.title: Asciidoc
item.description: asciidoctor asciidoctor Table of Contents mathjax ditaa plantuml syntax highlighting a2s vega vegalite mermaid bpmn nomnoml There are things to note! mathjax \(E = mc^2\) \[\begin{equation} x^2 + y^2 = z^2 \label{eq:sample} \end{equation}\] This is a reference to the equation above \(\eqref{eq:sample}\). ditaa plantuml syntax highlighting app.
